segments.text: Observing this indoor kitchen, it's a classic family setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult woman polishes her plate with care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her is a problem, thoughâ€”water's running over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's soaking the puddle growing at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How sloppy, letting it flood like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's adventure on the stool catches my eye next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched out, hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That unstable tilt makes me nervous for him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands ready, palm up for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their sneaky teamwork is kind of charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are open, framing the whole escapade.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window, the garden looks perfectly maintained.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry about the slip risk with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could turn into a sad accident so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The obliviousness of it all is disheartening.
segments.speaker: PAR
